name: UIToolTipConfiguration
desc: An object that a tooltip interaction delegate uses to describe the tooltip settings.

items.name: init(toolTip: String)
items.desc: Creates a tooltip configuration and sets the tooltip text.

items.name: init(toolTip: String, in: CGRect)
items.desc: Creates a tooltip configuration, and sets the tooltip text and hover region within the view or control.

items.name: var toolTip: String
items.desc: The text to display in the tooltip.

items.name: var sourceRect: CGRect?
items.desc: The region of the view or control where the pointer must hover to trigger the appearance of the tooltip.
